info.name: Backend-Dairy-API
info.description: This is a simple RESTful API for managing a digital diary platform selling dairy products like milk, yohghurt, ghee, and soured milk.

item.name: User
item.description: This is specializes only the users endpoints

item.name: Product

response.name: New Request
Create Product
Create Product
Create Product
Create Product
Create Product
New Request
response.body:
{
    "products": [
        {
            "id": "fec170d6-8639-48ab-9746-8789fe723e62",
            "name": " Dairy Pure Milk",
            "description": "Dairy milk is collected from farm animals mostly cattle. Milk contains many nutrients, including calcium and protein, as well as lactose and saturated fat.Milk contains antibodies and immune-modulating components that strengthen the immune system against many diseases.",
            "price": 18000,
            "quantity": 5,
            "categoryId": null
        },
        {
            "id": "32f57255-a528-4370-98e9-d3b954d6d731",
            "name": "Delightful Fruit Yogurt",
            "description": "Yogurt  is a food produced by bacterial fermentation of milk.Fermentation of sugars in the milk by these bacteria produces lactic acid, which acts on milk protein to give yogurt its texture and characteristic tart flavor.",
            "price": 50000,
            "quantity": 5,
            "categoryId": null
        },
        {
            "id": "ccf9579c-65ee-437b-b2f7-ba20ae7389eb",
            "name": "Delightful Fruit Yogurt",
            "description": "Yogurt  is a food produced by bacterial fermentation of milk.Fermentation of sugars in the milk by these bacteria produces lactic acid, which acts on milk protein to give yogurt its texture and characteristic tart flavor.",
            "price": 50000,
            "quantity": 5,
            "categoryId": null
        },
        {
            "id": "7ddc6292-9a9e-4995-a964-198ae4e52396",
            "name": "Classic Bongo",
            "description": "Bongo or Soured milk denotes a range of food products produced by the acidification of milk. Acidification, which gives the milk a tart taste, is achieved either through bacterial fermentation or through the addition of an acid, such as lemon juice or vinegar. The acid causes milk to coagulate and thicken, inhibiting the growth of harmful bacteria and improving the product's shelf life.",
            "price": 20000,
            "quantity": 5,
            "categoryId": null
        },
        {
            "id": "392c3c90-5556-46e3-9c7e-d4b12f761fc0",
            "name": "Well Cooked Ghee",
            "description": "Ghee is typically prepared by simmering butter, which is churned from cream, skimming any impurities from the surface, then pouring and retaining the clear liquid fat while discarding the solid residue that has settled to the bottom. Spices can be added for flavor. The texture, color, and taste of ghee depend on the quality of the butter, the milk used in the process, and the duration of boiling time.",
            "price": 50000,
            "quantity": 1,
            "categoryId": null
        },
        {
            "id": "f41a9a68-1d53-4b84-84a6-549a31d8f4af",
            "name": "Greek Yogurt",
            "description": "Greek yogurt is a protein-rich dairy product that’s high in many nutrients like vitamin B12, calcium, and selenium. But, its nutritional value and health benefits can vary depending on the brand you choose.",
            "price": 50000,
            "quantity": 5,
            "categoryId": null
        }
    ]
}
